description: Manage a database's transparent data encryption.

commands.name: az sql db tde set
commands.summary: Sets a database's transparent data encryption configuration.
commands.syntax:
az sql db tde set --status {Disabled, Enabled}
                  [--database]
                  [--ids]
                  [--resource-group]
                  [--server]
                  [--subscription]
examples: az sql db tde set --database mydb --resource-group MyResourceGroup --server myserver --status Enabled
